name: table-detector-extension
description: Browser extension that detects HTML tables on web pages

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:scripts && bun run build:copy
scripts.build:scripts: bun build src/content/index.ts --outfile dist/content.js --target browser && bun build src/background/index.ts --outfile dist/background.js --target browser
scripts.build:copy: cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp public/icon.png dist/
